message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product that I think you'd really appreciate. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to let it go for $12,000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product is high to you, but I am only able to offer $9,000 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a little further to $10,000.  Let me know what you think.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my budget constraints, I can offer $9,500 for the product. I hope this proposal works for you.
